metadata.title: CVE-2018-14624 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in 389-ds-base through versions 1.3.7.10,1.3.8.8 and 1.4.0.16. The lock controlling the error log was not correctlyused when re-opening the log file in log__error_emergency(). An attackercould send a flood of modifications to a very large DN, which would causeslapd to crash.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
